description:
✪ Watch the video above to see how you'll learn a step-by-step method to cure any bad habit and create any new habit you want. Then watch the course previews below to get a sneak peek at the content you'll be learning.

✪ You'll understand how habits control your life better than you ever have before, and you'll get the 6 steps you need to take to eliminate any bad habit and create any consistent, healthy routine you want, in a concise and compact course.

✪ You'll never have to force yourself to get things done anymore. Instead, put a bit of energy up front to create permanent, effortless habits, which do the work FOR YOU.

✮✮✮✮✮ Welcome to Habit Masterclass - The 6 Steps To Change Any Habit ✮✮✮✮✮

Here's what you'll learn in this course:

  • How tiny, 1% habit changes turned a national team that was a perennial loser into winners of the Tour De France and multiple Olympic Gold medals (in the same year)
  • Why bad habits form in the first place, and the real reason they are so hard to break
  • How to start any good habit - like learning an instrument, eating better, going to the gym consistently - and make sure it sticks, almost like you just 'uploaded' it into your brain's software.
  • How you can use the psychological concept of Identity to force yourself to change habits instantly (watch the Preview videos below)
  • How to use Shadowboxing and Visualization to condition habits before you actually do them in real life.
  • Have a list of habits you want to break or create? You'll learn the fastest way to get them all into your life as soon as possible.
  • Learn how to avoid subconsciously conditioning laziness.
  • The '5 Minute rule' that will get you up and running with your new habit by tomorrow.
  • How to prevent burn out and 'habit rejection'
  • A crash course in mindfulness to improve focus and concentration, and make it easier to form good habits.
  • The plan B you can fall back on when you miss a day forming a habit.

Who is this course for?

  • Students, freelancers, entrepreneurs and anybody else who thinks bad habits are holding them back in life
  • Anybody who cannot stay consistent with new practice routines or good work habits
  • Students with open minds
  • People who are ambitious and try hard, but can't be consistent on a day-to-day basis

Who is this not for?

  • Anybody with perfect self control and consistency
  • Anybody not willing to change their everyday habits and routines a bit in order to get results

Remember, if Habit Masterclass doesn't work for you, you have 30 days to get your money back with Udemy's Guarantee.

I don't believe I deserve your money if you aren't absolutely delighted with it, anyway.

Click "Take This Course" now, and I'll see you on the other side!

- Richard
title: Habit Masterclass - The 6 Steps To Change Any Habit
